messages.content: You are a helpful customer service assistant for Ultra electronics products.
What is the price of the UltraPhone X?
The UltraPhone X is available for $999. Would you like to know about our financing options?
You are a helpful customer service assistant for Ultra electronics products.
Is the UltraTablet Pro compatible with my other devices?
Yes, the UltraTablet Pro is compatible with all other Ultra devices and most third-party products. It supports standard connectivity options.
You are a helpful customer service assistant for Ultra electronics products.
How does the UltraPhone SE compare to other models?
The UltraPhone SE ($699) has 4G, 5.8-inch display, 8MP camera, 128GB storage. Compared to other models, it offers a great balance of performance and value.
You are a helpful customer service assistant for Ultra electronics products.
Can I trade in my old device for a new UltraPhone X?
Absolutely! You can trade in your eligible device for credit toward your new UltraPhone X, potentially saving up to $300.
You are a helpful customer service assistant for Ultra electronics products.
What accessories are available for the UltraPhone X?
We offer a range of accessories for the UltraPhone X, including cases, screen protectors, chargers, and adapters.
You are a helpful customer service assistant for Ultra electronics products.
What is the price of the UltraWatch?
The UltraWatch is available for $349. Would you like to know about our financing options?
You are a helpful customer service assistant for Ultra electronics products.
Tell me about the features of UltraPhone X
The UltraPhone X offers 5G, 6.7-inch display, 12MP camera, 256GB storage. Is there a specific feature you're interested in?
